rooms.description: A spacious and wheelchair-accessible entrance lobby with automatic doors and tactile floor finishes that align with local norms. Incorporates Vastu principles by placing the main entry in the north-east direction.
A luxurious living room featuring ample natural lighting, an open-plan layout and accessible pathways for wheelchair navigation. Vastu-aligned seating arrangement towards the east.
An elegantly designed dining space adjacent to the living room with a central table placement in line with Vastu's balance of energies. Features wheelchair accessible counters and seating.

A modern kitchen with energy-efficient appliances, integrated storage solutions, and an open layout that supports accessibility for wheelchairs. Designed in the northeast quadrant per Vastu guidelines.
Accessible guest toilet designed to meet local building norms with automatic fixtures and sufficient turning space for wheelchair users.
A private gym integrated into the ground floor, equipped with state-of-the-art equipment and accessible workout surfaces. Designed in a corner that promotes energy flow according to Vastu.

openings.description: Large automatic sliding doors ensuring easy entry for wheelchair users, complemented by ample lighting and accessibility features.
Energy-efficient windows placed to optimize natural light and enhance ventilation, aligning with local building norms and Vastu energy flow.
Balconies on the southwestern side provide outdoor access, designed for relaxation while adhering to safety and accessibility guidelines.

rooms.description: A luxurious master bedroom with a spacious en-suite bathroom, designed to ensure privacy and comfort. Vastu principles guide the placement of furniture and fixtures.
A comfortable secondary bedroom for children or guests, including accessible features such as wide doorways and grab bars in compliance with wheelchair accessibility requirements.
Modern bathroom designed with ample space for maneuverability. Features include walk-in shower options and non-slip flooring to ensure safety and adherence to local norms.

A dedicated home theater area featuring a retractable projector screen, soundproof walls and adjustable seating arrangements for enhanced viewing experience. Vastu elements are balanced by positioning the room in an energy-positive zone.
A versatile study or home office space designed with ergonomic furniture and ample natural light, ensuring a productive environment.

openings.description: Wheelchair accessible elevator integrated in the design ensures safe vertical movement between floors. The staircase is designed with ample lighting and handrails for safety, in compliance with local building codes.
Strategically placed windows ensure natural ventilation and light, while also adhering to Vastu guidelines for energy flow.

rooms.description: A spacious and landscaped rooftop terrace offering panoramic views, designed for relaxation and social gatherings. Incorporates wheelchair accessible pathways and seating areas.

openings.description: Accessible external staircases or ramps ensuring easy access to the terrace from the ground floor, compliant with local safety norms.
Integrated skylights provide additional natural light and ventilation on the rooftop terrace while aligning with Vastu principles.
